name: ACCUM_GENERAL
description: This table contains general information about accumulation (ACC) records.

columns.name: ACCUMULATION_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the accumulation record.

columns.name: ACCUM_PAT_ID
columns.description: The ID of the associated member.

columns.name: ACCUM_DATE
columns.description: The service date of the accumulation.

columns.name: ACCUM_INST_UPDATE_DTTM
columns.description: The instant this accumulation was created.

columns.name: ACCUM_USER_ID
columns.description: The user the accumulation was applied by.

columns.name: ACCUM_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: ACCUM_COMMENT
columns.description: The free-text comment associated with the accumulation.

columns.name: ACCUM_SRC_C_NAME
columns.description: The source type of the accumulation.

columns.name: ACCUM_SRC_CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The ID of the associated claim if the accumulation source is a claim.

columns.name: ACCUM_SRC_TX_ID
columns.description: The ID of the associated service if the accumulation source is a claim.

columns.name: REVERSAL_OF_ACC_ID
columns.description: The ID of the accumulation record that this record reverses.
